definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: If you please, I should like to commute the preaching.
sentences.chinese: 如果您願意，我會在感化院宣講。

sentences.english: Perhaps it's time to claim the wisdom of the moment?
sentences.chinese: 或許是該宣講智理的時候了？

sentences.english: We go out to witness and preach the Gospel of Christ through the spreading of the Word of God.
sentences.chinese: 我們出去透過傳逹神的話語，見證及宣講基督的福音。

sentences.english: It is necessary to warn as well as evangelize.
sentences.chinese: 既要宣講福音，也要給予警告。

sentences.english: 5Philip went down to a city in Samaria and proclaimed the Christ there.
sentences.chinese: 腓利下撒瑪利亞城去，宣講基督。

sentences.english: I didn't shirk my duties. I visited the sick and I preached the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有逃避職責，我探望病人，也宣講福音。

sentences.english: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria, and preached Christ unto them.
sentences.chinese: 腓利下撒瑪利亞城去，宣講基督。

sentences.english: Employers will make a presentation to introduce companies and job vacancies.
sentences.chinese: 招聘企業採用宣講會的方式介紹企業情況和職位空缺。

sentences.english: Many companies are even taking the initiative by giving introductory sessions on campuses across the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多公司甚至採取主動，在全國的大學校園開宣講會。

sentences.english: But the sermon should not be written and preached exclusively for this group.
sentences.chinese: 但是講章不應專爲他們所寫和宣講。

sentences.english: This dhamma desana of Than Acharn Maha Boowa is a rare and special one.
sentences.chinese: 尊者阿姜摩訶布瓦這次的宣講是稀有罕見特別的一次。

sentences.english: The teacher kept preaching about the importance of study.
sentences.chinese: 老師不斷地宣講學習的重要性。

sentences.english: How will an unbeliever proclaim the gospel and make good applications?
sentences.chinese: 一個非信徒怎能宣講福音並很好應用呢？

sentences.english: You can use a louder voice in proclaiming God's Law, which demands obedience.
sentences.chinese: 你在宣講神要求人順服的律法時可以聲音宏亮。

sentences.english: After listening to introductory speeches they surge to place their CVs next to company nametags.
sentences.chinese: 聽完宣講後，他們蜂擁將簡歷投向公司名牌附近。

sentences.english: And he was preaching in the synagogues of Galilee.
sentences.chinese: 他就常在猶太的各會堂中宣講。
